inn1.comm: Wide called. Harsh call. Banged in short, it whizzed, at above waist-high, just outside the leg stump.
Fuller, on the middle and off stump line, Ganguly leans forward, pushes it out to the cover region.
Another wide. Again pretty close to the leg stump. Another delivery that was short in nature. Ganguly shuffles across, tries to tickle but fails.

Drama. Very quick single. Ganguly drops the ball in front of him in the off side and they set off. Sehwag responds and rushes across.  The fielder from cover rushes in, swoops on the ball, Sehwag almost collides with him and jumps into the crease. The bails are off. Sehwag's feet - he doesn't ground his bat, he just jumped into the crease- are in. The collision didn't allow him to ground the bat. It is refered upstairs, not out is the verdict. Meanwhile Ganguly also collides with the the bowler at the other end!
Two wides and now a no-ball. On the off stump line, guided to point
In the channel outside off, left alone
Sehwag is up and away. A length-delivery on the pads, clipped past square leg.
He is taking a middle stump guard. Moves back - not that much, but slightly, and across, and pushes a length delivery on the off stump away
Mortaza finishes on a high. A beauty. It landed on the off stump line, on a length and held its line, Sehwag pushes at it and ends up playing inside the line.
Jaffa! Syed Rasel teases the outside edge. legcutter that lands on a perfect length, around off stump, sucking Ganguly into a lame prod before it left him.
A nervous flash outside off. Slightly short and a touch wide outside off, Ganguly decides rather late to play a stroke, has a flash and misses.
fuller, comes in with the left-armer's angle, pushed back down the track
pitched on a length, around off stump line, shaped away and Ganguly moves into line, pushes it out into the cover region
Out in the middle Dada moves behind the line of a length-delivery on the off stump line and plays it quietly to the off side.
On the off stump line again - Rasel has been pretty good at that in this over, defended off the front foot

Gone! Mortaza nails Sehwag! Sehwag's disastrous recent run continues. Perfect offcutter that landed outside off stump, on a good length and cut back in. Sehwag's eyes lit up at what he perceived as width and shaped to cut it. The ball jagged back in, took the inside-edge and crashed into the furniture. Bangladesh taste first blood.

Shout for lbw. Another lovely offcutter. Shapes back in, Uthappa is beaten on the forward prod , the bat is way outside the line and the ball raps him on the front pad. Just outside off stump and high as well.
Fuller, on the off stump line, driven through the covers
lands on the middle stump, moves towards leg stump, Uthappa takes the bottom-hand out of the handle, tickles it to shortish  fine leg
Rushes through the channel outside off, Ganguly lets it go through to the 'keeper
Bouncer! Lands on the leg stump line, veers in even as it climbs up and ends up going outside off. Ganguly just sways away from the line.
slightly wide outside off stump, moves further away, Ganguly lets it go like a monk.
His fingers held across the seam, he runs in, hurls one on the off and middle stump line, Uthappa leans forward and defends
lovely delivery. It landed on the off stump line and bent back in a touch, Uthappa, however, was ready, didn't go across, played it straight back to the bowler
on the off and middle, slightly short, Uthappa whips it across, towards square-leg
pushes this one to the leg side, full in length, Ganguly leans forward, glances it to fine-leg for a single.
full in length, around off stump line, going on with the angle, Uthappa leans forward, covers the line, pushes it out to mid-off.
beaten! Pushes this one further away from Uthappa who lunges at it and the ball kisses past the outside edge. Agony for the bowler, relief for the batsman
In the channel outside off stump, left alone.

Razzak at cover flies like Jonty! Pushed close to the off side, Ganguly takes a few steps down the track and Razzak rushes in, picks the delivery and goes airborne as he flicks a throw at the stumps. Misses it but it was pretty good effort.
Beauty! Lands on a length, around off stump line and holds the line a touch, Ganguly's bat comes from outside the line and the ball threads the bat and pad gap and heads towards the 'keeper
this one lands on the off stump, shapes away further, left all alone
beaten again! Ganguly tries to break free with a flash. It landed on the off stump and rushed through the corridor, Ganguly tried to force it off the back foot but makes no contact
hits the deck on the off and middle stump line, moves towards off, Ganguly gets behind that one and defends.

Now it's Uthappawho is beaten! Excellent stuff from Bangladesh. Another one angling away through the corridor of uncertainity and Uthappa is certainly uncertain. A lame poke, almost fatal but the ball just about misses the outside edge.
pushes a length delivery to off side

Close close shout for lbw! Lands on the off stump line, on a length, Uthapa pushes forward but is stunned as the ball jags back in. The ball thuds into the pad in front off off stump. It was coming back in and would have , rather might have, taken out the top of the middle. Umpire Davis doesn't agree and Uthappa will stay.
intelligent stuff frm Rasel. Takes this one away with the angle and Uthappa is beaten, playing inside the line
First boundary of the day! Slightly short on the middle and leg stump line, Uthappa eases back and whips it past square-leg
troubles with another one that bends back in. But this one doesn't do so much and Uthappa is rapped on the pads outside off stump
Ganguly gives the charge! No luck though. hits a length delivery straight to cover. He backed away to the leg side as he advanced down the track.
Another no-ball from Mortaza. Hits the deck short of length, rises above waist-high on the off and middle stump line, pushed to cover point
Now a widde. Lands on short of length, on the middle stump line, moves away down the leg side
Nicely punched away! Pure timing and the modern-day bat! Short of length, just outside off, Uthappa moves back, opens the bat-face, punches it past point.

Mortaza you beauty! Removes Uthappa now. Full in length and outside off stump, shapes away a touch and Uthappa is sucked into a fatal drive. He drives at it, bat away from the body, and the ball goes off the edge straight to Aftab Ahmed at point. Bangladesh fielders erupt in joy and why not. India two down and struggling.

shout for lbw! point of impact was outside off stump. Pressure on the litte big man. Tendulkar pushes across rather hesitantly and the ball jags back in from outside off to rap him on the pads. It would have taken out off but the point of impact was just outside off.

Lovely delivery. It landed on the same spot as the previous one - on a length, just outside off- but this one held its line. Tendulkar shaped to push at it but withdraws his bat at the last minute. Wise decision.
length delivery, on the off stump line, punched to cover
Fuller, on the leg and middle stump line, bends back in and Ganguly respects that movement and instead of whipping it square, plays it towards midwicket.
on a length, around off stump line, punched towards point.
Another tentative poke, another inside-edge. A slightly slower offcutter on the off stump line, Ganguly pushes at it, bat away from the pad and gets a edge, down to fine leg
Tendulkar is taking a middle-stump guard. Leans forward, pushes it towards cover.
lands on a length, around middle and off, moves towards off stump, Tendulkar arrests his forward movement, works it to the on side
Fab delivery. Lands on a length, just outside off, comes back in to rap Tendulkar on the pads. Outside offstump and hence they don't appeal
Length delivery on the off stump line, defended of the front foot
htis the deck short of length, on the middle stump line, moves away, Ganguly opens the bat-face to adjust to the movement and guides it to point
ouch! Ganguly is hit on the forearm. similar length to the previous one but this one holds its line and heads straight on. Ganguly is surprised and hurried by movement and pace and is hit on the arm.
Takes this one away, and run down to third man
Feeble shout for lbw. Another in-cutter. Lands on a good length, outside off stump and moves in appreciably and raps Tendulkar as he pushes forward in defense. Height was the concern.
Mortaza continues to bowl well. This one rushes through the channel outside off, with a bit of bounce, and Tendulkar shoulders arms
Curves away from off stump line, Ganguly lets it go past him.
beaten. Ganguly is cleary frustrated with the shackles imposed by Bangladesh. He charges out and tries a heave and the ball bounces over the flashing blade and into the gloves of the 'keeper
leans forward to a length-delivery on the off stump line, defends to the off side.
strangling line on the off stump, Ganguly tries to punch it away, cramped for room, pushes it out to cover
slightly slower, offcutter, on the middle stump, Ganguly waits, pushes it to the leg side
hones in on the off stump, again no room for Ganguly, ends up pushing it to cover point

Lovely delivery, whizzing over the off stump. It lands outside off and comes back in, Tendulkar shapes to play but withdraws his bat from the line at the very alst minute and the ball goes over the off stump
Tendulkar's first boundary. on the middle and leg stump line, Tendulkar leans forward and clips it his unique style past square-leg
In the zone outside off stump line, left alone
Well outside off stump, full in length, Tendulkar thrusts his left foot across, covers his off stump and shoulders arms.
lands on the off stump line, curves away, run down to backward point
Ganguly punches this through the off side ring. Short in length and that gave Ganguly the time to force it away off the back foot
Now he strays to the legs. Ganguly leans forward to flick it past square leg
Length-delivery outside off stump, Ganguly slashes it down to the third man
lands on a length, around middle and off, slants away, Tendulkar moves towards the line, drives it towards cover
slightly slower, offcutter outside off - rather useful delivery, but Tendulkar doesn't throw his bat at it , plays close to the body, pushes it out along the ground towards cover point
on the off stump line, defended off the front foot
on the hips, tucked to square-leg
length-delivery around off stump, slanting away, Ganguly stands tall, punches it to Razzaq at cover
On the hips, dabbed away down to fine leg
another probing delivery, just outside off stump, and this one holds its line. Tendulkar shuffles across, opens the bat-face to adjust to the straightening and guides it to point
In the channel outside off, Tendulkar thrusts his left foot outside the off stump, shoulders arms

Tendulkar tries to impose himself but doesn't quite manage. Charges out, down the track, Rasel adjusts by shortening the length and Tendulkar is rapped on the pad as the ball nips back in. Rasel appeals but the ball was going over the stumps
That Tendulkar straight drive. Hit on the up. Just leans forward to a length-delivery, pushes through the line and it runs between the bowler and mid-off.
on the middle and off, angling away, Tendulkar flashes it down to third man
lands on the middle stump line, on a length, comes back in, Ganguly plays a touch outside the line, gets a inside-edge on to his pad.
Full in length, on the middle and leg stump line, flicked past square-leg .
flat and fast, around off stump line, driven to cover
flights this one, around off stump line, Tendulkar leans forward, drives to cover
slips it down the leg side, attempted sweep shot, the ball runs off the pad to fine leg
flat and on the off stump line, guided with an open-face of the bat to point
tossed up on the off stump, driven to cover

Razzak gets the big wicket. With an arm ball. lands on the off and middle, Tendulkar drives but is surprised as the ball comes back in. His bat comes down outside the line and he gets an inside-edge on to the top of the bat and it pops up to the 'keeper. Bangladesh are having a ball out there. Super stuff from them.
fullish delivery drifting on to middle and leg, Ganguly moves across towards the offside and drives it wide of mid-on for two
better line from Rasel, pitching on a good length outside off stump and shaping into Ganguly who gets on the front foot and blocks
straighter line on off and middle, Ganguly leans forward and defends to the leg side

Ganguly moves towards the off and dabs to midwicket, Dravid sets off for the single but Ganguly sends him back, Razzak at midwicket swoops down on it picks up and fires it in at the non-striker's end, Habibul Bashar fails to back up and Bangladesh concede four overthrows
short and wide outside off stump, Ganguly pounces on the width and frees his arms, the ball races to the point fence
defended solidly on the front foot
bowled quickly on of stump, Dravid gets half forward and defends unconvincingly back to Razzak
pushed to covers on the back foot
Razzak strays on to middle and leg and Dravid turns it off his pads behind square for a single
tossed up from over the wicket to the left-hander, Ganguly gets forward and blocks
slants into off and middle stump, Ganguly leans across and turns it to square leg
fuller ball outside off stump, Ganguly strides out to meet the ball on the pitch and drives to cover
angles across the right-hander from over the wicket, pitches just outside off stump and moves away from Dravid who lets it go
closer line this time, pitching on off stump and straightening, Dravid gets behind the line and defends

this time he pitches on middle and leg, Dravid whips it off his hips to deep square leg, the ball is headed for the ropes but Tamim Iqbal comes out of no where with a full length dive and saves the four, excellent stuff
full length drifting on to middle and leg, Ganguly clips it off his pads but straight to midwicket, he should have put that away
good length delivery on off stump, Ganguly is early with the forward defence and the ball hits high on the bat
defended on the front foot towards cover
pushed through quicker on middle and leg at 100 kmh, Dravid tries to flick but gets beaten by the change of pace
this time he moves right across and turns the ball to deep square leg

Ganguly frees his arms and comes down the track, he wanted to hit that down the ground but the ball hit a thick outside edge over cover, he got enough on that for it to reach the fence but it was far from convincing
defended on the front foot back to the bowler
Razzak drops it a touch shorter, Ganguly goes back and plays it to short third man
bowled flat and wide outside off stump, Ganguly backs away and tries to cut, he misses and looks at the umpire hopefully, looking for the wide but he doesn't get it
angling across the right-hander after pitching on off stump, Dravid uses the width to free his arms and cut to third man
bowled short of a length outside off stump, Ganguly plays it with soft hands on the off side and sets off for the single, Dravid sends him back
pitches on off and middle, Ganguly plays it off his hips to square leg
tight line adn length on off and middle, Ganguly gets behind the line and blocks towards cover, Rasel has just two more balls to go, he deserves a wicket
pitches in the channel outside off stump and goes straight through, Ganguly lets it go
fuller length outside off stump, Ganguly opens the face and plays it to point
drifting on to middle and leg, Dravid plays it to short fine leg
width offered outside off stump, Dravid cuts but can't beat point
driven to mid on off the front foot
tossed up on off stump, Dravid gets behind the line and defends on the off side
tight line and length on of stump, Dravid defends back to the bowler
Razzak drops it a little short outside off and Dravid cuts to deep point, Bashar has protection on the fence
fired in quick into Dravid's off stump, he gets a stride in and defends
this time he beats Dravid with the length, Dravid should have pushed forward but he plays back and defends
Dravid tries to sweep from outside off stump and misses
he tries to sweep yet again and once more he misses, the ball turns a fraction and hits him on the thigh
Saqibul drops it short and DRavid rocks on to the back foot and cuts to deep point
defended on the front foot towards midwicket
dropped a little short again on off stump, Dravid moves back in his crease and cuts through cover point for a single
tossed up outside off stump, Ganguly moves forward and opens the face late to play it to short third man
drifting on to middle stump, Ganguly turns ot off his pads behind square for one
oooh dangerous, Dravid moves back and cuts from middle stump through the off side
played with soft hands on the off side, they scamper through for a quick single
full length on off and middle, Dravid plays forward and drives through mid on for another single, India are content with accumulation at the moment
bowled flat and just outside off stump, Dravid waits for it and cuts to deep point for one more, just the four men in the circle now
Ganguly waits on the back foot for one that pitches on off and middle, he uses the angle to turn it behind square for one more
defended back to the bowler on the back foot
Saqibul is pushing it through quickly to Dravid who plays back and drives through cover
Saqibul gives Ganguly a little width and he cuts to the man patrolling the point fence
pitches outside off stump and it turns away from Dravid who cuts to the point fence where Bashar has protection

and he strikes with his first ball! He floats that through to Dravid, pitching on middle stump and going straight through, Dravid tries to flick and misses, the ball hits the pad and after a prolonged appeal Aleem Dar raises the finger, Dravid looks unhappy but that was clipping leg stump
blocked on the front foot back to the bowler
tossed up on off stump, Yuvraj gets a big stride in and defends
Yuvraj takes and step down trying to throw Rafique off his length, he isn;t to the pitch of the balla nd defends back to the bowler
driven to mid on off the front foot
defended to midwicket this time off the front foot, Rafique completes a wicket maiden
Saqibul fires it quick on off stump, Ganugly blocks on the front foot
shorter length on off stump, Ganguly goes back and defends to the leg side
played to point with and open face
tossed up slower through the air to Yuvraj, he leans forward and closes the face to play it to midwicket
width offered this time and Yuvraj reaches out and cuts to the fielder on the point boundary
fuller ball on middle and leg stump, Ganguly clips it off his toes in front of square leg for one
bowler flatter on off and middle stump, Ganguly plays back and defends to midwicket
slower ball this time but the line is drifting on to middle, Ganguly plays it through square leg for one
tossed up slowly on off stump, Yuvraj plays forward and defends back to the bowler
turned off the pads through short fine leg for a single
Ganguly plays forward to one that pitches outside off and turns into him, he opens the face to play it wide of short third man for a single
Yuvraj drives between point and cover for a single to end the over
pitches on off stump and angles into Yuvraj who moves forward and closes the face to play it through square leg
flicked off the pads behind square for one more
drifting on to leg stump once more, Yuvraj plays it fine past the man at short fine leg, nearly past that is for he dives across and takes the pace of the ball as it goes past
nearly got a leading edge back to the bowler on that occasion, he closed the face of the bat too early
driven straight to mid-on on the front foot
drifts on to leg stump and Yuvraj turns it off his pads to fine leg
Rafique angles into Yuvraj's pads and he flicks it through square leg easily
tossed up slowly on Ganguly's off stump, he reaches out for it and defends back to the bowler
defended back to the bowler on the front foot
that bounced a bit more on Ganguly who played back and tried to run it fine, he misses and there's a huge appeal for caught behind, the umpire says not out
floated through on off stump, Ganguly leans across and plays it to midwicket
defended back to the bowler on the front foot
bowled flat and fast on off and middle, Yuvraj gets behind the line and blocks
bowled much slower outside off stump, Yuvraj has a tentative poke at it and gets beaten
driven past the bowler to long off for a single
fuller ball on middle stump, driven through midwicket for a single
full length ball on middle stump, driven to long on for one
bowled flat and fast outside off stump, anguly uses the pace to run it fine past short third man
short of length, just outside off, turns in , punched back to the bowler
again turns in from outside off, drives to right of Aftab at coer who fires in a quick throw. Ganguly makes it in time. only just.
flighted, fuller and on the middle and off, driven to long-on for a single.
on the off stump line, turns in , dabbed unconvincingly to the on side
bit of turn, coming towards off stump, pushed down the track
straighter one but well outside off, Yuvraj leans back and cuts past backward point
strangling line on the off stump. Bit of turn in, Ganguly dabs it away in front of him
leans forward, pushes a delivery, with the turn, to midwicket
turns in from the off stump, Ganguly backs away, pushes it out to cover
slips this one down the leg side, may have been affected by Ganguly's movement to the legside in the previous delivery
again turns down the leg side, tucked past square-leg
flatter, on the middle stump line, turns in , Yuvraj leans forward, whips it straight to backward square-leg
beaten! arm-ball outside the off stump, Yuvraj shapes to cut but the ball bounces over the flashing blade
Skier, lands in no-mans' land in the deep extra cover region. He charged out to loft, and got a thick outside edge and it spooned over cover
on the off stump line, spins in, Ganguly plays it to the right of midwicket
tossed up, Ganguly charges out but the ball dips beautifully, on the middle and leg and Ganguly has to be contend, pushing it back to the bowler
turns to the hips, clips straight to midwicket
flatter and faster - this man is a very good bowler- , pushed out to cover
slower, on the off and middle stump line, pushed to the on side and Rafique moves to his left to make the stop
just short of driveable length, on the off stump line, turned to midwicket
sixth boundary of the innings. turning down leg side and Yuvraj paddles it away fine.
on the off and middle, Yuvraj threatens to charge out but respects the line and the length, just leans forward to defend
fuller, on the middle stump line, turning in and Yubvraj wrists it to backward square-leg
Yuvraj Singh sweeps it in front of square. Powerfully. He just leant forward to a full delivery and swept if forcefully.
This one is cut past backward point. Short in length and Yuvi rocks back to cut. The shackles are being broken in this over. Will we see a bowling change soon?
short and flat, on the off and middle stump line, Ganguly stays where he is, punches it down to long on
slower through the air, on the off and middle, turned past square-leg for a single.
Charges out , to the pitch of the delivery and creams it flat and hard, past the bowler and straight to the boundary.
turning on the leg side, flicked past square-leg for a single
good delivery, flat and fast, on the off stump line, Yuvraj is hurried onto his defensive push
slower this time, outside off, driven to long off
on the off stump line, dabbed to midwicket
floated on the off and middle, on a length and Yuvraj sweeps it to long leg
slightly short outside off and cut past point. The sweeper comes around to make the stop

That's fifty for Ganguly. His 65th ODI fifty and his second one in World Cup, excluding his hundreds. full and straight, outside off, nudged to backward point for a single. A patient knock so far. Trying to shepherd India.
on the middle and leg, worked to the on side for a single
fifty of the partnership is up with a drive to long-on
he comes down the track, fired it on his legs and whipped straight to midwicket
on the off stump line, Ganguly leans forward, opens the bat-face, runs it past point
beaten! trying to be too cute. It was a fullish delivery, outside off stump, Yuvraj leant forward and tried to late cut.
leans forward again but this time guides it past point
on the off and middle, slow through the air, Ganguly leans forward, pushes it to on side
smart work from Rafique. He saw Ganguly charging out, fired it short and fast on the off stump, Ganguly adjusted and pushed it out to point
on the leg stump line, turned striaght to short fine leg
comes down the track, flat and fast on the legs, he just pushes it away. He is starting to charge out a trifle early and the bowler is spotting it.
on the middle and leg, punched to left of the bowler who makes a neat stop
turns in towards leg and middle, short of length, whipped to midwicket
this time he will get a single, with a firm push to long-on
floated on the middle and leg, slightly short in length, Yuvraj stands tall to punch it to wide long on
Ganguly is getting frustrated by the stranglehold. He rushes out and tries a big heave but is beaten in the flight and then by the turn and is rapped on the pads
floated on the middle and leg stump line, Ganguly gets a top edge while sweeping and it runs past short fine leg
comes down the track and drills straight to long-on
Swing and miss. He attempts to sweep it from outside off and doesn't get a touch
turns in from outside off, Yuvraj punch-drives it to long-off
on the off stump line, driven to long-on
leans forward, opens the bat-face, runs it to backward point for a single
beautifully played. Turns in from outside off, short in length, Yuvraj opens the bat-face and cuts it late but a good diving stop by the short third man will allow him just a single
leans forward, drives to long-on. Wonder when they will start going for the broke
on the middle and leg stump line, defended to the on side.
defended back to the bowler on the back foot
Ganguly uses his feet and gives Razzak the charge, he doesn't get to the pitch of the ball but flays it to the long off boundary
worked off the pads through square leg for a single
bowled flat and short outside off stump, Yuvraj goes back to pull but mis-times it back to the bowler
thies time he rocks and and pulls a short ball majestically over midwicket, he finds the gap in the deep perfectly
bowled flat short and fast down leg side, Yuvraj pulls behind square leg for one more
there she goes! Yuvraj steps down the track, meets the ball on the bounce and hoists Rafique over the midwicket fence, outstanding  shot
Yuvraj tries to close the face of the bat too early and gets a leading edge to the leg side
full toss, Yuvraj lifts it down to long on where a superb save saves two runs
driven through covers for a single
pushed through quickly on off and middle, Ganguly defends back to Rafique
Ganguly steps down the track and tries to clear the in field, he mis-hits it and the ball falls just short of the fielder at midwicket
pitches outside off stump and angles into Yuvraj who gets beaten and hit on the pad outside off stump, they run a leg bye to the off side
Ganguly backs away and slaps it down to long off for a single
Yuvraj plays on the front foot and defends to midwicket
huge huge wicket for Bangladesh, Yuvraj tries to play the big sweep shot but gets a top edge, the ball flies high in the air but straight to Habibul Bashar at short fine leg
pulled to deep midwicket for a single
bowld flat and quick on off stump, Dhoni plays on the back foot and defends to point
Rafique bowls the arm ball outside off stump, Ganguly tries to cut it but gets beaten

Rafique you beauty, Ganguly tries to give him the charge, Rafique drags it short, Ganguly attempts to pull  but he doesn't get the elevation and hits it straight to Razzak at midwicket who takes a sharp low catch
flicked to midwicket for a single
fired in fast from round the wicket into dhoni's pads, he tries to flick but loses balance and gets hit on the pad

India are in shambles, Dhoni spots a shortish delivery outside off stump, decides to cut and cuts it straight to the waiting hands of Aftab Ahmed at short third man, Bangladesh are delirious in their celebrations
loud appeal for leg before turned down, Rafique fired that quick into Agarkar's pads but the impact was justa  little outside off stump, very close call though
defended back to the bowler on the front foot
and it's Harbhajan's turn to take the lonely walk back! He tries to cut a fast arm ball from off and middle stump, he misses and Razzak rattles the stumps
defended on the back foot back to the bowler
Zaheer Khan goes right back in his crease and tries to flick, he misses and the ball hits the pad
once more Zaheer moves across and tries to play it to square leg, he has little clue of what's happening out there
played off the front foot to short fine leg

jubilation for Bangladesh, Mortaza hits a perfect line and length first up, the length draws Agarkar forward and induces him to drive, the ball kisses the outside edge and Mushfiqur takes the easiest of catches behind the wicket, the Indians are dropping like flies
full toss outside off stump, Munaf hits it through cover for one, Mortaza was looking for the yorker to finish him off
this time he gets the yorker right, Zaheer digs it out , Mortaza had over-stepped his crease
short of a length ball outside off stump, Zaheer opens the face of the bat and runs it past point
good length ball just outside off stump, Munaf backs away and prods at it, the ball whizzes past the edge and the stumps
Mortaza bangs it short, Munaf backs away and lets it go, is he setting him up for the yorker?
he is indeed, but Munaf manages to get his bat down it time and squeeze it to extra cover for a single
fuller ball on off and middle stump, Munaf gets a stride in and defends
drifting on to leg stump and Munaf goes down on one knee and sweeps to the deep backward square leg fence, precious runs for India
Munaf plays forward and defends to the leg side for a quick single
bowled straight through on off stump, at a lively pace as well, defended to cover on the front foot
pushed towards cover once more
Zaheer dabs it in front of the man at cover and scampers through for the single
banged in short of a length and angles into Zaheer who defends on the back foot and then falls over in his crease
short of a length once more and Zaheer plays it in front of point for a single, this is sensible batting from the final pair
that's a lucky boundary, Munaf backs away and plays an undescribable shot, he poked at it and then closed the face, the ball took the outside edge and flew through the vacant slip cordon for four
played back to the bowler, Mortaza grabs it and threatens to fling it back at the batsman
Mortaza digs in the bouncer and it's mis-directed down leg side
width offered outside off stump, Munaf cuts and times the shot extremely well, the balls races towards the fence but Aftab dives full length on the fence to save the boundary
driven on the front foot past the bowler for  a single
bowled flat and fast on off stump, Munaf shuffles forward and defends
Munaf tries to sweep to deep fine leg but the ball hits the pad and goes through midwicket
width offered outside off stump, Zaheer tries to cut but misses
this time he connects, that was far too wide from Razzak and Zaheer cuts past the fielder at short fine leg for four more
Zaheer goes for the big one and the top edge falls in no mans land as three fielders converge on it  in the deep cover region, two more to the total
full ball on the pads, Zaheer turns it through square leg and retains strike
full toss outside off stump, searching  for the yorker no doubt, Zaheer smears it with a flat bat over extra cover for four
the attempted yorker on middle and leg, Zaheer digs it out to long on for one more
that's the end of the innings, Mortaza digs the slower ball in short, Munaf backs away and attempts to hit over cover, he gets beaten by the change of pace and hits it straight to Razzak at cover

inn2.comm: Rushes through the channel outside off stump, Tamim leans across, shoulders arms.
this one jags back in from outside off, Tamim tries to work it on side but is beaten by the movement and is rapped on the pad. Going down though.
Swing and a miss! Tamim  attempts an expansive flash outside off and is beaten
Wow! what a shot from Tamim Iqbal. Calypso style. He went down on a bent knee and slashed it square. Whiplash square drive. Super strike
close to the off stump, rushes on straight, Nafees shuffles across and lets it go through to the 'keeper
Ajit hurls one on the middle stump line, Tamim pushes it to the on side.
swings down the leg side, clips the pad enroute to a diving Dhoni
this one moves away from Iqbal who leans forward, sees the movement and shoulders arms
Wider outside off and again left alone
Way down the leg side. Dhoni flings himself to his right but can't reach it. He would have had to be a superman to get to it.
full and straight on the off and middle stump line, Iqbal pushes hard at it and gets an outside edge, down to third man
takes it away from short of length around off stump, left all alone.
on a length, around off stump line, shapes in,  pushed back to the bowler
Iqbal produces that square-drive again. Stylish. Just goes down on a bent knee and lashes it past backward point. Agarkar from third man covers up
beaten! Kicks up from short of length and moves away from the off stump, he has a flash and is beaten
sails down the leg side.Landed on the middle stump and moves down. There is some movement out there. Still.
lands on the off stump, moves in towards the hips, tries to tuck it away, misses and the ball bounds off the thigh pad and rolls in front of him
on the middle and leg stump line, tucked behind square-leg for a single.
Whack! Stand up and deliver. Short of length, just outside off stump and Iqbal punches it on the up and through extra cover.
drifts on to the pads, flicked away to long leg where Munaf Patel makes the stop
length-delivery on the off and middle stump line, Iqbal eases confidently forward, punches through the line, back to the bowler. He is looking pretty good out there.
pushes a delivery on the off stump line to mid-off.
Wah! This one flies over point. Fullish, just outside off and the fiesty Iqbal again goes down on his knee and slashes it over point. Whack!
banged in short, on the hips, helped around fine. Didn't make proper contact with the pull and went one bounce to Dhoni who gloved it away
again slipping down leg side, glanced away to fine leg
on the middle and leg, tucked to Ganguly at square-leg
eases forward, pushes a length-delivery to cover

Zaheer takes out Nafees. Lands outside off stump, cuts back in but Nafees shoulders arms. To his horror the ball bends back in to hit him in front of offstump. Would have taken out the top of the off stump.  It struck him just outsisde off but there was no shot offered and hence he was given out. This game is going to be a thriller.
leans forward to defend a length-delivery on the middle and leg stump line
on the middle and off stump line, defended on the front foot
slanting away from Rahim, left alone
swinging down the leg side, again clips the pads and Dhoni dives to gather it
hits the deck short of length, on the hips, clipped to the left of Ganguly, at square-leg, who makes a diving stop
swinging down the leg side, Tamim tries to whip it away, but misses and is rapped on the pads. It landed outside leg stump and was going down
good delivery, on the off stump line, Iqbal tries to force it away through the off side,  gets an inside-edge which takes the ball to midwicket
Nice. Very nice shot. Full in length, just outside off and the young Rahim shuffles across to punch-drive it through cover.
in the zone outside off , left alone

Huge shout for a catch but it went off the helmet grill! Banged in short, it rose head-high, Iqbal shaped to pull but it was too fast and the bounce was steep. It hit him on the  grill and bounded off to Sehwag at second slip.
Oh ho! Iqbal charges out and has a wild slash and is beaten.
length-delivery, on the middle stump line, worked to midwicket
similar delivery, Iqbal tries to force it through mid-off,  the bat-face shuts and the ball rolls over to mid-on. Iqbal wants a run but decides against.
Wah Wah! Super punch shot through point. Short of length and on the off stump, Iqbal hops back, his head still and punches it past point
This boy is a fiesty batsman. He charges down the track, Zaheer drags back the length but Iqbal knifes through the line. Up and over mid-off for a fab four.
Munaf Patel starts off with a beauty. In the channel outside off and Rahim pushes inside the line and is beaten as the ball leaves him
this one comes in after landing on the off and middle stump line, worked to square-leg. Ganguly fields, has a shy at the non-strikers end - Iqbal had advanced down the track.
on the middle stump line, from a length, Rahim gets behind the line, pushes, gets a inside edge to square-leg
bouncer, on the off stump channel, Rahim drops his wrists nicely and sways away
nice probing line, close to the off stump but Rahim knows where his off stump is. Shuffles across and shoulders arms.
beaten. Slightly short in length and it moves away from off stump, Rahim doesn't quite move his feet across, had a dab at it and the ball bounces over the flashing blade.
Shot! full and on the off stump, Iqbal launches into a off drive but hits straight to mid-off
length-delivery on the off stump line, pushed back to the bowler
short of length, just outside off stump, Iqbal couldn't resist a flash and it flies down to third man
leans forward, pushes a length-delivery past point for a single
on a good length, around off stump, Iqbal stays adjacent to the line, to give him some room for his off-drives and pushes this one back to the bowler
again he stays adjacent to the line, doesn't get behind it  and whips a delivery on the middle stump to the leg side.
ambles in, lands on the good length, on the middle stump line, moves towards off, defended off the front foot
slips it down leg side, wide called. Bangladesh sitting pretty at 39 for 1. Can they go on and pull off a win?
swing and a miss! Perfect line and length. Just short of a driveable length and around off, it moves away. Iqbal flashes at it and is beaten
short of length, on the off and middle stump line, punched to cover
fuller, on the off stump line, driven to mid-off
on a length, around off stump line, Iqbal again stays where he is, punches it inside-out to cover. Looks a very strong player on the off side
Whoa! Six over wide third man! He waltzes down the track, Munaf pushes it outside off and Iqbal throws his bat at it. It soars over third man and beyond the ropes. Iqbal on raging fire here!
on the hips, tucked to Agarkar at fine leg
OMG! what a shot! fifty up in style. Fullish and just outside off and what does Iqbal do? He just leans forward and smokes it through the line through extra cover. Fab shot.
Wallop! Zaheer comes from round the wickets and bangs one in short. Iqbal flays it over point.
on a length, around off, punched to cover
Murder! Simply imperious! Charges down the track like a invading marauder and pulls a short-of-length delivery over long-on. What a fiesty player!
Full in length, on the off stump line, holds its line a touch and Rahim pushes down the line and gets a outside edge, down to third man
full, on the middle and leg, Iqbal leans forward, turns it to the leg side
What an exciting talent this boy is! Leans forward to a fullish delivery outside off and creams it through extra cover. No one moved. He has moved to 49 in a blink. unbelievable.
Exciting and sensible as well. He is cool and calm. Just leans forward to this one, pushes it to the off side, wants a run but Rahim declines.
Did I speak too soon?! Down he comes again, like a young raging bull, and tries to send a length-delivery back to Dhaka. Doesn't time it well and the ball rolls over to Ganguly at square-leg

That's fifty for Tamim Iqbal. Take a bow. Dropped by Dravid at mid-off. A tough chance though. Another charge down the track and he swats it on the up to rhe right of Dravid who stretches his right hand out but ends up palming it.
tossed up, outside off, defended off the front foot
flighted up, outside off, full in length, Rahim leans forward to caress it through cover.
turns in from outside off, Rahim goes back, turns it to point
leans forward to defend a delivery on the off stump
floated outside off stump, turned to Munaf Patel at point. What is Munaf doing there?!!
spins in from outside off, dabbed to right of Dravid at slip
length-delivery on the off and middle, Iqbal leans forward, pushes it to cover region

Iqbal falls. Fatal poke outside off stump. But what an innings it has been. The guy has exploded into public imagination and how. A lovely probing delivery in  the channel and Iqbal pokes at it and nicks it behind.
lands on a length, moves in towards middle and off, tucks it behind square-leg for a single
in the channel outside off stump line, hint of away movement, run down to third man
fuller and on the off stump line, pushed to cover region
floated outside off and paddled away from there to fine-leg. Cheeky!

beautiful doosra! Sucks the batsman into a loose drive and he plays down the wrong line. Dhoni gathers, whips the bails off and appeals for a stumping. It is refered upstairs and not out is the answer. The back foot was planted inside the crease

Another doosra and almost caught and bowled. Flighted on the middle and leg, he tries to play it to the on side and gets a leading edge to the left of Harbhajan who tries desperately to get to it but fails.
floated on the middle stump line, defended off the front foot
slightly flatter, outside off , defends on the front foot.
pitches on a good length just outside off stump, defended to point on the front foot

dropped! That pitched on off stump and jagged back into Rahim, he fended at it and got a thick outside edge that flew low to Dhoni's right, he dived for it with one hand and got a glove to it, it popped in and popped out
defended on the front foot
shorter in length and wide outside off stump, Rahim frees his arms and cuts to deep point for one
short and wide yet again and Aftab unleashes a fierce cut, the ball rockets along the turf and Harbhajan at third man has no chance

Munaf strikes! That pitches just outside off stump and jags back into Aftab who tries to slog it over the leg side, he misses and gets hit on the back foot in front of middle stump, it's as plumb as can be
tossed up on off and middle, the angle takes it towards leg and the batsman flicks off his pads for a single
tossed up nicely on middle and off stump, Saqibul pushes forward and gets hit on the pad
defended solidly on the front foot to short leg
tossed up on middle and off stump, Saqibul gets a stride in and defends
swept down to deep square leg for a single to get off the mark
flatter ball on off stump, Rahim gets on to the front foot and defends back to the bowler
pitches on off stump and angles across the left-hander, defended on the front foot to the of side
beauty! Munaf hits the perfect length outside off stump and induces Saqibul to flash at it, the ball beats the outside edge
fuller ball on leg stump, Saqibul should have put that away but he flicks it straight to midwicket
short of  length ball pitching on off stump and shaping away from Saqibul who gets forward and punches firmly to cover
pitches on a good length on middle and off stump, Saqibul gets squared up and defends back to Munaf on the back foot
fuller ball on off stump, Saqibul gets forward and drives, the ball hits the outside edge and goes along the ground to third man for a single
good length ball on off stump, Saqibul drives to cover on the front foot
tight line on middle and off stump, Saqibul moves back in his crease, gets behind the line and blocks
pitches on leg and middle stump, Agarkar is bowling them just short of a length, Saqibul plays it to midwicket on the back foot
pushed towards cover on the back foot, Saqibul sets off for the single but changes his mind
pitches on middle and off on a good length, Saqibul defends solidly with the full face of the bat back to the bowler
this time he pushes it wide of the man at mid off and sets off for a quick single, Agarkar starts his second spell on a good note
that was very close, Saqibul attempted to play a sweep shot but got beaten by the turn and bounce, the ball just missed off stump
delightful shot, Saqibul uses his feet superbly to get to the pitch of the ball, he drives with a straight bat past Munaf at mid-off for four
driven to mid-off on the front foot
that was too close to cut, Saqibul was beaten on that occasion and lucky not to edge it
flicked off his pads through midwicket for a single
sharp bounce for Harbhajan, that took off after pitching outside off stump, Rahim thrust his pad out at it and let it go
Agarkar bowls it wide outside off stump, angling across the left hander, Saqibul cuts hard but straight to point
this time Saqibul laces the square drive through cover point, Harbhajan Singh does extremely well to dive full length on the fence to save the boundary
poor ball, short and wide outside off stump, Saqibul waits on the back foot and smashes it through covers for four
he overcompensates by straying on to the pads, Saqibul tries to flick it but misses and gets hit on the pad
once more the line is on leg stump, Saqibul misses the flick yet again
Agarkar persists with the leg stump line and this time Saqibul makes contact but can't beat midwicket
Rahim steps down the track and Harbhajan fires it full and down leg side, he plays it to square leg
Rahim lunges forward at it and the ball hits the pad and flies wide of Uthappa at short leg
flatter ball on off stump, pushed on the back foot to cover
blistering shot, Rahim uses his feet, takes on Harbhajan, gets to the pitch of the ball and hammers it over the straight boundary, massive massive hit, that cleared the boundary by miles
defended back to the bowler on the front foot
Harbhajan pushes it flat through on middle and leg stump, defended to the man at short leg
good length ball on off stump, Saqibul covers the line and plays it towards mid-off
Agarkar pulls the bouncer out of his bag of tricks, it doesn't work as Saqibul ducks under it easily
Agarkar bangs it in short again and this time Saqibul swivels and pulls, he doesn't connect properly and gets a single to fine leg
excellent ball, pitched just outside off stump and moved away from Rahim who stood rooted to his crease and fended at it, the ball beat the edge
once more, that was too close to the body for the cut shot and Rahim was comprehensively beaten
good length ball pitching just outside off stump and shaping into the right-hander, defended on the front foot towards cover point
bowled fast and flat on off stump, Saqibul cuts but can't beat short third man
defended on the front foot towards point
tossed up slowly at 54mph on middle and off stump, defended back to the bowler on the front foot
pushed firmly of the front foot towards cover
Harbhajan fires it in quick into middle stump, Saqibul drives back towards him, Harbhajan dives to his right but can't field it cleanly
defended towards midwicket on the front foot
Agarkar bangs it in short yet again, Saqibul pulls and although he didn;t hit it cleanly, there was enough power for it to clear the infield
full and wide outside off stump, that's a freebie that Saqibul lashes through cover, it's headed for the fence until Tendulkar runs across and picks it up with one hand just inside the rope
defended back to the bowler on the front foot
pushed wide of mid-off on the front foot for a single, the batsman look at ease against Agarkar
fuller ball on middle and leg, Rahim moves across his stumps and flicks nonchalantly to deep square leg
short of a length on leg and middle stump, Saqibul tries to force it through the leg side and gets an inside edge down to fine leg
cheeky cheeky, Saqibul moves acroos his stumps and plays a chip shot through short fine leg for two more
defended on the back foot to forward short leg
full ball on the pads, clipped through midwicket for one more
poor poor line from Harbhajan, slipping down leg side, Rahim dabs it off his pads down to fine leg where Zaheer Khan picks it up inside the ropes
defended on the back foot to the off side
quicker ball fired into middle stump, Rahim digs it out on the leg side
good length ball on middle stump, driven on the front foot to midwicket, Tendulkar is bowling seam up to the left hander
driven on the front foot to long on for one more
fullish length outside off stump, Rahim plays forward and opens the face to guide it to short third man
too close to cut, Rahim was looking to beat the fielder at short third man and collect four but he did not make contact
that's very very close, that pitched in line of off stump and Rahim moved a long way across, he got hit on the pad in front of middle and leg and the height was fine, not much wrong with that appeal
defended back to the bowler on the front foot
good length ball angling into the left-hander, defended on the back foot
short of a length ball outside off stump, Saqibul cuts off the back foot and Yuvraj mis-fields at point to concede the single
defended on the back foot towards cover, Zaheer has kept it tight so far but the Bangladesh batsmen have looked very comfortable
short of a length ball outside off stump, Rahim pushes at it and the ball hits the edge and falls just short of Sehwag at first slip
Saqibul flashes at that one outside off stump and gets beaten, it wouldn't have mattered if he had nicked it for Zaheer had overstepped
it would have mattered this time for Zaheer didn't overstep but Saqibul had another flash and was beaten once more
defended back to the bowler on the front foot
Tendulkar strays down leg side and Rahim clips him down to fine leg for an oh-so-easy single
Tendulkar bowls it quicker on middle and off stump, Saqibul plays back in his crease and defends back to the bowler
driven on the front foot down to long on for a single
Rahim moves across his stumps and dabs it behind square for another single
shorter length on middle stump, Saqibul stands tall on the back foot and drives back to Tendulkar
terrible line, outside leg stump, worked off the pads down to fine leg for one more
pitches outside off stump and angles into Saqibul who drives in front of Yuvraj at point who dives to his left to cut off the single
driven on the front foot to mid-on
slightly shorter this time and Saqibul rocks back and tries to pull, he doesn't make proper contact and hits it to mid-on
fuller length outside off stump, Saqibul moves forward and drives on the up to cover
once more he tries to heave Zaheer down the ground, he doesn't connect well and mis-hits it to the bowler
fuller ball on off and middle stump, Saqibul defends back to Zaheer on the front foot
Seam-up delivery outside off stump, turned to backward point
full and straight on the middle stump line, driven to midwicket
And again.
this time he gets it dwon to AGarkar at long-on
on the middle stump line. pushed to cover
drfiting down the leg side
full and straight, just outside off stump, pushed with an angled bat and gets an inside edge towards square-leg
he has been welcomed with an slap! Came down the track, backing to the leg side and biffed it down the ground.
Clubbed away! Full and wide, outside off, slashed over backward point. Bangladesh are rushing along very nicely here.
full and straight on the middle and off stump line, driven towards mid-on
on a length, just outside off, comes in a touch, defended to the off side
good delivery. cut back in from the off stump line and threaded the bat and pad gap and thudded into the inner thigh. Ouch!
full and on the middle stump line, driven to the bowler
floated on the off stump, pushed to cover
on the off stump line, punched back to the bowler
slightly short of length, sliding outside off, cut to Zaheer at backward point
tossed up, on the middle stump line, driven to left of Tendulkar at mid-off
just outside off, dabbed to point
And again.
on the off stump line, pushed back to the bower. Munaf stops, throws the ball to Dravid at mid-off who shines it. Looking for reverse here. Only reverse likely is the result!
leans forward, drives through cover . Karthik, the substitute, gets around from deep point
Would you believe it? it's a top-edge, aand it lands near the ropes behind the 'keeper. A wild swing across the line and the ball flies off the edge.
full and on the off and middle, shapes in slightly, driven to cover
on a length, goes on straight outside off stump, dabbed down to third man
on the middle stump line, swept away past square-leg
Hasan has heard the call apparently. He goes down town. He charges down the track to biff a full delivery down the ground.
tossed up, on the off stump line, driven to cover where Uthappa makes the stop, hurls a wide throw at the non-striker's end
on the off and middle stump line, full and straight, driven back to Yuvraj
flighted outside off, nudged to the off side
turns in from outside off, driven to Tendulkar at point
leans forward to a delivery turning in from outside off and defends
lands on the off stump line, spins in, turned to short-leg
flighted delivery, bit of loop as well and Rahim is down the track but is beaten in the flight. he adjusts to just push it away
full and on the middle stump line, driven back to the bowler. That's a maiden over.
floated outside leg stump, swept to Ganguly at fine leg
one flew over the cuckoo's nest! Tossed up on the off and middle stump line, slap-slogged away over deep midwicket. Super strike!
caution after offence. Leans forward, square-drives a fullish delivery past point
flighted on the middle stump line, driven to Agarkar at long-on
slides in from outside off, Rahim eases back, punches it to the off side
on the off stump line, full in length, driven to Sehwag at cover
from round the wickets, on the middle stump line, punched back to the bowler
tossed up on the leg stump line, full in length, attempted sweep and is rapped on the pads. Going down leg side.
comes in with the arm, from round the wickets, jabbed away to cover
Boom! Waltzes down the track and plays a lovely inside-out shot over wide long-off. Awesome strike! Bangladesh are doing it in style.
on the legs, turned to short fine leg
on the off stump line, drives and gets an inside-edge towards square-leg
defended on the front foot.
on the middle stump line, pushed to left of midwicket for a single
on the middle stump line, turns away, pushed to cover
down the leg side, attempted sweep doesn't make contact

Hasan is stumped. He goes down the track but is beaten in flight and by the spin. The ball brushes the back pad and rolls to Dhoni who whips the bails off in a flash. Only 29 runs to go for Bangladesh.
sliding on to the middle and leg stump, turned to the on side
flighted delivery on the middle stump line, whipped to Sehwag at midwicket
lands on the off and middle, turns in, nudged to short-leg
tossed up, a doosra on the middle and leg stump, whipped to Munaf Patel at deep square leg
lands outside off, a topspinner, bit of extra bounce and Basher stabs it away
doosra and that beats Basher. Keeps a touch low as well and Basher ends up pushing inside the line
defended on the back foot
on the off and middle, defended to short-leg
Aha! Super shot! Dances down the track and lofts a flighted delivery right over the head of the bowler. Twinkling foot work.
goes back, turns it to midwicket
low full toss, driven straight to mid-on
on the off stump, bit of extra bounce, jabbed away to left of short-leg
comes down the track, drags the length, turned to short-leg
full toss outside off stump, Basher hist it with the toe end of the bat to wide mid off for a single to get off the mark
fullish ball wide outside off stump, Rahim slashes at it on the front foot but gets beaten
short and wide outside off stump, Rahim leaps up and uppercuts it wide of Tendulkar at third man for foure more, Sehwag used to play that shot!
fired into the blockhole on off and middle stump, Rahim digs it out on the off side
width offered yet again, Rahim drives past point to Tendulkar on the fence for one more, just 18 needed now
good length ball angling into off stump, Bashar gets  stride in and defends back to the bowler
short ball on off and middle stump, Rahim pulls it to deep square leg
stumped! Bashar gives Sehwag the charge looking to hit over the infield because mid-on was in the circle, he misses and Dhoni whips off the bails in a flash, too little and too late for India
dropped! or did it carry? Ashraful defended it straight o short leg but looks like the ball fell just short
defended on the front foot to the off side
bowled quick on to leg stump, defended onthe back foot to the man at forward short leg
Agarkar sends Rahim a short one and he tries to play the uppercut yet again, this time he doesn't make contact and Dhoni collects the ball
Rahim drives on the up at one that is pitched on a good length, the outside edge flies down to third man
tight line and length on off stump, Rahim gets behind the line and blocks
cuts him in half! Agarkar moved that back into the right-hander fron just outside off stump, Rahim pushed forward at it but the ball threaded the gap between bat and pad
Agarkar over-steps, poor stuff from him, driven to mid-on, just 15 needed now
pitches outside off stump and goes straight through to Dhoni, Rahim lets it go
pitches outside off stump and moves wider away from Rahim who plays no shot
Sehwag pitches it short on off and middle, Rahim waits for it and pulls to deep midwicket, the single brings up his fifty, take a bow Rahim, it's been a  top innings
defended on the front foot to the off side
the dashing Ashraful gets into the act, full ball outside off stump, he gets down on one knee and slams it through covers for four, Bangladesh just ten away now
turned off his pads to fine leg for one more
defended on the front foot, the inside edge goes past the man at forward short leg, 8 needed now
driven to mid-off on the front foot
short and wide outside off, Rahim cuts to third man to take them one run closer
dropped! Ashraful mis-timed the pull, Harbhajan came charging in from deep square leg and dived forward but couldn't cling on, it's been that sort of day for India
defended on the leg side
Agarkar bowls the yorker and Rahim digs it out easily
Agarkar looks for the blockhole once more but bowls a full toss, Rahim plays it to Dravid at mid-on
short of a length outside off stump, Rahim plays back and cuts it down to deep point
pushed down to long on off the back foot for a single
tossed up on off stump, Ashraful goes right back and defends back to the bowler
he gets a long stride in this time and blocks
fuller ball on middle and leg, Ashraful moves across and plays the paddle sweep to fine leg, two more to win
defended watchfully on the front foot
defended on the back foot to the off side
good length ball on middle and off stump, defended on the off side
Rahim runs it down to third man for a single, the scores are tied!
Ashraful shows unusual restraint and defends another good length ball to the leg side
once again, Ashraful gets behind the line and pushes it towards cover
fuller length from Zaheer on off stump, Ashraful plays back and defends
slower ball on middle stump, Ashraful defends back to the bowler
fuller length on off stump, defended back to the bowler on the front foot
good length ball on off and middle, defended on the back foot towards the off side
and that's that! Rahim drives elegantly through covers to seal the victory, it's been as emphatic as you could have imagined!
